articles.description: Barrow manager Phil Brown has his say after his team were beaten 2-1 at home by Port Vale
articles.content:
Barrow boss Phil Brown praised Port Vale but said they got a little help from referee James Oldham on their way to a 2-1 win.

articles.description: Coventry City boss Mark Robins says Rovers only had themselves to blame for the time added on in the 2-2 draw.
articles.content:

articles.title: Plymouth Argyle player ratings as promotion push continues with Oxford United win - Plymouth Live
articles.description: The Pilgrims were rewarded for an excellent second half showing with a 1-0 victory in front of nearly 16,000 fans at Home Park
articles.content:
Plymouth Argyle had seven players out injured but still had enough about them to beat Oxford United 1-0 in a top-of-the-table League One clash.

articles.title: Women's Six Nations: France make it two wins from two by overpowering Ireland 40-5 - BBC
articles.description: France continue their successful start to the Women's Six Nations by overpowering Ireland 40-5 in Toulouse to make it two wins from two.
articles.content:
Women's Six Nations: France v Ireland
France (26) 40
Tries: Llorens, Sansus 2, Forlani, Joyeux, Boulard Cons: Drouin, Tremouliere Pens: Drouin 2
